div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem septimo
die mensis maij anno quo supra

The said day the bailyes assignit monunday that nixt cumis to hens' robesone
to ansueir to the borgh' fundin one him be Johnne arthour anent the biing
of ane stik of clatht fra him and' aw to mak him pament tharof

Eodem die patricius leslie senior Inuenit Alexandrum mar' plegius legalis quod gilbertus
prestone erit Indempnis pro eo aliter quam per viam Juris secundum tenorem littere regie
desuper preposito et balliuis directe Et dictus patricius obligauit se ad conseruandum
predictum suum plegium Indempnis de huiusmodi fideiussione

Eodem die Johannes leslie de Warderis deuenit plegius legalis per manus
sue dextere ostensionem quod gilbertus prestone erit Indempnis pro patricio leslie
Juniore aliter quam per viam Juris secundum tenorem littere regie sibi desuper directe Et
dominus patricius obligauit se ad conseruandum suum plegium Indempnem de huiusmodi fideiussione

The said' day the actioun' debatabile betuix patry leslie one that ane part Ande
gilbert prestone anent ane yerd' with Consent of batht the saide partiis was
continevit to monunday that nixt cumis vndir hoip of Concord' and persoune chosin
betuix thame to conuene and common' betuix thame for the gude of the saide
matir

The saide day patry leslie eldar denyit the borghe' fundin on'
one him be Copin hile for the lauboring and manvring of ane
Croft pertening without tak or assedacioun' et cetera as in the act of the
buk maid' tharapone mair' fullely is Contenit Ande offerit
him tile vndirlie the decisione of ane assis' tharanent Ande becaus'
the Court was waik and ane assis' coud' nocht be comprehendit
the balyeis with Consent of the said' partiis continevit the said' burghe'
to monunday that next Cumis and warnit the saide partiis to Comper
the said' day befor thame for ane decision' of the said' burghe

The said' day gilbert menyeis and thomas leslie grauntit that thai hed'
set to patry leslie the Croft quhilk James Colisone and Copin hile
clamys

The said' day James Colisone allegit the Croft his Conques'
and propir lande quhilk patry leslie clamys in tak and that the saide
James wile Occupy and manvir' the samyn as he thinkis
maist expedient Ande taxit sex merkis of maile in the yer' gif
the saide patry Occupeis and labouris It without tak or Sufficient assedacion
of him Ande protestis for remed' of law tyme and place and befor
quhome It efferis

The said' day patry leslie allegit the said' Croft set to him be
gilbert menyeis and thomas leslie quhilk he hede labourit manvrit
and savin ande avouit the samyn with the perele of law

Eodem die Jacobus hile fecit constituit creauit et nominauit Jacobum Colison'
suum legittimum procuratorem actorem factorem ac mandatum specialem dans et concedens
eidem suam liberam potestatem ac mandatum speciale pro se et nomine suo ad prose
quendum patricium leslie pro iniusta Intromissione Crofti suj et cetera Ac in omnibus aliis
actionibus et causis ipsum tangens promittens de Rato et grato in vberiore
forma procuratorij Cum Ceteris clausulis necessariis et oportunis

head.add: Decimo die mensis maij quo supra

div.p:
Eodem die Johannes rob Johnestoune fecit constituit creauit nominauit et ordinauit
gilbertum Johnestone de elphinstone malcomum Crag Magistros Johannem marschell
et Alexandrum lausone suos procuratores

Curia Balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo die mensis
maij Anno Domini et cetera quingentesimo Septimo

The said day the bailyes continewit the oppinyng of the witnes producit be Johnne auchneff
to friday that nixt cumis in siclik forme and' effect as thai ar now becaus' Duncan
colisoun' tuk him to preiff the said day the said matir tane to summissioun'

The said day Johnne' fechat grant him awand' to thomas Waus bailye
x s' quhilk he oblist him to pay betuix this and' friday that nixt cumis

The saide' day Copin hile reuocauit gilbert menyeis and thomas leslie and ale vthir his
procuratoris maid' obefor except James Colisone quhilk he ratifeit and affir
mit his lauchfule procurator as in the act of the buk maid' Obefor Is contenit

The saide day the prouest and balyeis ordanit the officiaris to pas' and warne
Williame Colp to Comper befor thame the xij day of the monetht
of maij Instant tile ansuer' tile out Souerane lordis lettres directit to thame
anent the landis and gudis of Isabele buchane et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xijo
die mensis maij anno quo supra

The saide day the actioun' persewit be Robert guthtre et cetera agane
Williame Colp anent the landis and gudis pertening to Isabele buchan
with consent of partj is continevit quhile friday eftir witsonday hereftir
in hoip of concorde

Eodem die Robertus guthtrie fecit constituit creauit et nominauit Andream
fif suum legittimum procuratorem actorem factorem ac nuncium specialem dans et
Concedens eidem suam liberam potestatem ac mandatum speciale ad prose
quendum et calumpniandum Dauid colp et Willelmum colp pro bonis et terris
Isabelle buchane et cetera secundum tenorem littere regie desuper directum agendum
defendendum respondendum et cetera promittens de Rato et grato in vberiore forma
procuratorij Cum ceteris terminis necessariis et oportunis

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' patry
leslie forspekar that riche garuok sale depone the gret
aitht that he bocht nocht ane pece of claitht contenyng
eln' fra Androw bavne quhilk being done he is quyt of
the challange of the said' Androw And' gif he will nocht depone
the said Androw sall depone and' the said' richerd sal mak
pament be the said' Androw

The said day sande tulideff was conuict be ane suorne' assis' patry
lesly forspekar for the tribulance of Dauid coupar for the quhilkis
he was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera And' thai ordanyt that
the said Alexander sale ask the said Dauid forgevnes and' gif half
ane pund' of wax to the haly blud licht vneforgevin And' quhilk
of the said partijs that tribulis vthiris in tyme to cum sand' beis con
uict' tharof sale pay fourty s' to sanct nicholes' werk vneforgevin
And' thareftir Johnne crak come souerte be his hand vphaldin for the
said Dauid coupar gif he euere tribulis the said Alexander to pay
the said fourty s' And' Dauid straloch' come souerte be his
hand' vphaldin for the said' Alexander and' to pay the said xl s' gif
he happinnis to tribull the said Dauid

The said day it was deliuerit be an' suorn' assis' thomas chamer
forspekar for that elen' lyntoun' was conuict be the said assis'
for the stribulance of malle mar for the quhilkis sche was in
ane amerciament of the court et cetera And' the said' malle mar quyt of
ale tribulance of the said' elen' And' referit the amendis to
friday that nixt cumis to be maid' to the said' malle mar'

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xiijo die mensis maij Anno quo supra

The said day Johnne auchneiwe one that ane part Duncan colisone one
that vthir part was oblist be the fathtis of thar bodiis to stand' at the ordi
nance of thomas Waus patry lesly eldar ser Johnne stirueling Androw fif
and' george bisset anent ane belt folouit be the said' Johnne' auchneif in
the Name' of his douchtir And' Johnne colisone and' the said' Johnne
auchneff was oblist be the faithtis of thar bodijs to stand' at the said'
personis anent ane maser debatable betuix tham' quhilkis personis
was oblist be the faithtis of thar bodiis to deliuer in the said' matir betuix
this and the trinite day nixt to cum And' the witnes producit be the partiis
salbe opnit to the said' personis

The said day Alexander Ramsay oblist him to pay to Androw Edin
deauch x s' betuix this and' witsonday of the rest of xxxiij s' iiij d'
And' patry lesly eldar come souerte for the pament of the said' some

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xvij die maij anno quo supra

The said' day the balyeis assignit friday that next cumis
to thome talyour tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one
him be thomas talyour lammyntone for the wranguis haldin
fra him of ane Caldroun and for the wranguis' occupeing
of the saide Caldrone

The saide day the balyeis assignit friday Cum xv dais to Canny
badenaghe and Dauid theman to preiwe the pece of golde quhilk
Cristy symmir' fand' tharis and quhilk happinis to preiwe the
said' gold' tharis to revard' the said cristy for his labour'

The said' day the aldirman and balyeis chargit thomas
leslie to gif Sesin of the lande of vmquhile Johne
lovis eftir the tenor of the kingis precepe of Sesin and
Chartir maid' tharapon' producit In Jugement

The saide day It was statut and ordanit be the prouest balyeis and Counsale
for the vphaldin of the alde louabile Consuetude honor and Rite of the tone
that ale manere of yonkheris burges and burges sonnis conuenient salbe redy
euere haly day to pas' with the abbat and prior of bonacord' in thar array
Conuenient tharto vndir the pane of xxtj s' Ilkane personis that falyeis and beis conuict'
tharof for thar vnlavis vnforgevin quhilkis vnlawis salbe departit betuix Sanct
nicholes werk and the said' abbat and prior equalie Ande in likuis' thai ordanit
the iiijor officiaris to be redy and pas' with the said' abbatis and prior continualie for the honor
of the tone et cetera

Curia Balliuorum burgi de Abirdein' Tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxjo
die mensis Maij Anno quo supra

head.add: Inquisicio Ninianj blinseill et Johannis tailyour alias gray

div.p:
Inquisicio facta Apud burgum de Abirdeine vicesimo primo die mensis maij Anno domini
millesimo quingentesimo Septimo coram honorabilibus viris Andrea
cullane preposito et thomas Waus vno balliuorum burgj de Abirdene
in pretorio eiusdem protribunali sedenti per subscriptis videlicet Dauid menyeis
gilbertum menyeis Jacobum colisone Andream ffif patricium red' thomam
chammer in vico furcarum Duncanum ffif patricium red' Andream straton'
Johannem grig Willelmum cheischame Johannem andirsone allanum litstar Alexandrum
burnat Dauid adamsone Malcomum crag Johannem Ramsay Johannem
murray Johannem portar et Alexandrum hay burgenses dicti burgj Quj
Juratj dicunt quod quondam Johannes talyour alias gray auus Johannes
tailyour alias gray latoris presencium obijt vltimo vestitus et sasitus vt
de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri regis

Iidem Juratj dicunt quod Ninianus blinseill est legitimus et propinquior
heres quondam Dauid blinseill fratris suj et cetera

Iidem Juratj dicunt quod Johannes tailyour alias gray est legitimus
et propinquior heres quondam Mariote chamer auie sue

Eodem die Johannes tailyour alias gray fecit constituit creauit nominauit et ordinauit
Jacobum crichtoun' de frendraucht militem et Johannem Mar burgenses burgj de Abirdene
coniunctim et diuisim suos legittimos et Indubitatos curatores dantes et concedentes eisdem
et eorum alteri coniunctim et diuisim suam liberam Interam et omnimodam potestatem se terras
suas et bona vbicumque locorum Regendum defendendum quousque per nouerit ad legittimam
etatem secundum Jura regum scocie cum consensu et assensu prepositi et balliuorum eiusdem
burgj ad que obseruanda magnum corporale prestitit Juramentum Et quod non fuit cho
acta seducta nec dolo vel fraude circumuenta In vberiore forma qua fierj poterit
Et dictus Johannes Mar magnum corporale prestitit Juramentum de fidelitate premisse
obseruando

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxviijo
die maij anno quo supra

The said' day mariorie falconar grauntit hir conducit and feit with thome of
tovy for ane yer' Ande thareftir the balyeis chargit hir' to mak him seruice for
the saide yer' eftir hir' avne graunt

The said' day cristiane andirsone grantit hir conducit and feit with
thome bryane for ane yer' Ande thareftir the balyeis chargit hir'
to mak him seruice for the said' yer' eftir hir avne graunt

The said' day the aldirman and balyeis assignit monunday that next
Cumis the last day of maij Instant to Dauid Colp one that ane part
and to the procuratouris of Robert guthtre one that vthir to Comper befor
thame bringand' with thame thar probacionis witnes preuis and richtis
quhilkis thai haue and wile vys' anent the age of Isabele buchane
douchtir and ayr tile vmquhile Williame buchane burgis of the
said' burghe quethir scho be vteuthe tutory and extendit the age
tharof According to the tenor of our Souerane lordis directit to
thame tharapon'

The said' day the Court wardit schew for law and It was gevin
for dome that Androu sale make continuale seruice to Johne
mathesone for ane yer' next hereftir

The said' day Androw fif procurator to Robert guthtre allegit Isabele buchan
vteuthe tutory and askit the aldirman and balyeis ane lauchfule day
to be assignit to preiwe his said' allegeance protestand for Re
med' of law et cetera tyme and place quhar It efferis

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vltimo
die mensis maij Anno quo supra et cetera

The said day It was appontit and' accordit betuix Dauid colp allegit tutor to Isabell
buchane one that ane part and' Androw ffif procuratour for Robert guthre one
that vthir part one this maner that is to say thai haue chosin mastir Dauid setoun' per
sone of balheluy mastir William crichtone persone of Inuernochty Androw cullan' pro
uest of Abirdene D Dauid menyeis and' gilbert menyeis to conuen' one monunday
that nixt cumis quhair thai think expedient and' common' anent the age of the said'
Isabell quhethir sche be within tutory or nocht and' se gif thai can' agre the said'
partijs And' gif thai agre nocht to comper the said day befor the prouest and'
bailyes to persew Justice And' thai continewe the said actioun' to the said' day
And' the said' Androw tuk one him to warn' the said robert to the said day

The said day the prouest and' bailyes statut and' ordanit that ale skyn
naris sale gang befor the cordinaris in ale processionis baitht in candilmes' play
and vtheris processionis that accordis thame to gang in

The said day the prouest bailyes and' counsaill statut and' ordanit that
nay hatmakar withtin this burgh mak na hattis of hewit coloris and' spe
cialy of nay thrummis nothir hewit nor vnhweit And' gif ony hatmakar
dois sic thing that thair hattis salbe eschet and to and' gevin to the pro
ffit of sanct nicholes' wark leswis' than it be present to Johnne reid' to se
gif it sufficient stuf and' weill cumin'

The said day robert Waus grantit befor the prouest and' balyes to an
suer to ale thingis that thomas chamer has to say to robert prat as law
will
